title: 12/29/21 DPS Best Of - Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 12/29/21 DPS Best Of - Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
description:
On the Wednesday edition of The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, Doug and Rob pay tribute to John Madden on the morning after the death of the legendary coach and broadcaster. Both of the guys think that the thing that people forget most about Madden is the fact that he was a great head football coach.

Former Jets and Browns head coach Eric Mangini joins Doug and Rob to talk about John Madden from the perspective of a head coach, and to discuss the major headlines going into week 17 of the NFL season.

Doug and Rob react to the situation between Hall of Famer Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and Lebron James. The guys question how Lebron chose to respond to Abdul-Jabbar's criticism regarding the meme Lebron put out on Instagram regarding Covid, the flu and the cold.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
